unnormalised: Arre bhai, aanik ek budget सत्र? Dishta gõvornment ₹30,00,00,00,000 "infrastructure development"acher karch korunk yevjita. Mhaka dista tanim खऱ्याक infrastructure develop korunk zai, fokot ठेकेदारांचे खिसे भरावचे न्हय! Fattlim vorsa tanim ₹20,00,00,00,000 vantle punn raste azunui khodyancho भरलेले आसात. Zait tar tanim ek clause ghalunk zai ki jar tanim kam korun दाखयलें ना, zalyar tanim amkam soglyank ₹100 परत दिवचे पडtle! Tem ek hanspachem natak zatlem, chintun pelya 1.4 billion lok apli 100 rupiank लाइनन उभे रावून!
normalised: are bhai, ani ek budget session? distha asa sorkar rupee teen koti infrastructure developmentacher karch korunk sodta. mhaka aasha asa te khorench infrastructure develop kortole ani fakt contractorschea jebank nhoi! fattlya varsha tani rupee don koti dile punn rosto azunui khoddyanin bhorla. zait mhantat tani ek clause ghala zait ki zaka lagun te deliver korunk shakona teka amka soklleka rupee ek she ditalem zait! te ek khushichi godi zateli, kalpna kara ek point char koti lok tanka rupee ek she gheunk line-in ube astole!
text: Arre bhai, aanik ek budget सत्र? Dishta gõvornment ₹30,00,00,00,000 "infrastructure development"acher karch korunk yevjita. Mhaka dista tanim खऱ्याक infrastructure develop korunk zai, fokot ठेकेदारांचे खिसे भरावचे न्हय! Fattlim vorsa tanim ₹20,00,00,00,000 vantle punn raste azunui khodyancho भरलेले आसात. Zait tar tanim ek clause ghalunk zai ki jar tanim kam korun दाखयलें ना, zalyar tanim amkam soglyank ₹100 परत दिवचे पडtle! Tem ek hanspachem natak zatlem, chintun pelya 1.4 billion lok apli 100 rupiank लाइनन उभे रावून!
